comment: The set of numbers generated by the roots of polynomials in the _rational numbers_ is the same as the set of algebraic numbers, which by ~ elaa are defined only in terms of polynomials over the integers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Jul-2014.) (Proof shortened by AV, 3-Oct-2020.)
